topic: Trends in user-generated content for energy sector marketing
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is to craft a marketing story that highlights a unique, untold aspect of my product or service, linking it to a current cultural or industry trend. My next step is to brainstorm these unique elements and identify a trend that aligns with them. Then, I will develop an interactive campaign that encourages user-generated content, allowing the audience to participate in the storytelling process, thus enhancing engagement and authenticity.

metadata.trigger: If I wanted to make marketing content today, what story hook would I use?
